CLASS.name: ALPHA AND BETA SYMPATHOMIMETICS (IM AND IV ROUTES)
ANGIOTENSIN II RECEPTOR ANTAGONISTS or ANGIOTENSIN RECEPTOR BLOCKERS (ARBs)
ANTIPARASITICS THAT TEND TO INDUCE TORSADES DE POINTES
BETA-2 MIMETICS or BETA2 ADRENERGIC AGONISTS
BETA BLOCKING AGENTS (EXCEPT ESMOLOL AND SOTALOL)
DOPAMINERGIC ALKALOIDS OF ERGOT OF RYE
GASTRO-INTESTINAL TARGETED MEDICATIONS, ANTACIDS, AND ABSORBANTS

DRUG.name: Aluminum Hydoxide and Magnesium carbonate gel

CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENT)
LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (PREVENTIVE DOSES)
MEDICATIONS AT RISK WHEN WITHDRAWING FROM TOBACCO
MEDICATIONS AT THE ORIGIN OF A SEROTONIN SYNDROME
MEDICATIONS AT THE ORIGIN OF ORTHOSTATIC HYPOTENSION
MEDICATIONS THAT LOWER THE EPILEPTIC THRESHOLD
NEUROLEPTICS THAT TEND TO INDUCE TORSADES DE POINTES

DRUG.name: Trinitrine known as Nitroglycerin in the US

CLASS.name: NON-CONTRACEPTIVE PROGESTOGENS, COMBINED WITH AN ESTROGEN OR NOT
OPIOID RECEPTOR ANTAGONISTS (called Partial antagonist opiods in French)
POTASSIUM SPARING DIURETICS (ALONE OR IN COMBINATION)
REVERSIBLE MAOI-A, INCLUDING LINEZOLIDE AND METHYLENE BLUE
SUBSTANCES THAT TEND TO INDUCE TORSADES DE POINTES
SUBSTANCES WITH ABSORPTION REDUCED BY GASTRO-INTESTINAL TARGETED MEDICATIONS, ANTACIDS, AND ABSORBANTS
TORSADES DE POINTES INDUCING MEDICATIONS (EXCEPT ANTIPARASITICS, NEUROLEPTICS, METHADONE)
TRIPTANS NOT METABOLIZED BY THE MAO
UNFRACTIONATED HEPARIN (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENTS)
VASOCONSTRICTOR ALKALOIDS OF ERGOT OF RYE
